item.title: 标准模板库 API
item.description: a function named next_permutation() #include<cstdio> void swap(char items[], int i, int j) { char temp = items[i]; items[i] = items[j]; items[j] = temp; } void reverse(char items[], int l, int r) { while (l < r) swap(items, l++, r--); } bool next_permutation(char items[], int size) { int i = size - 2; while (i >= 0 && items[i] >= items[i + 1]) i--; if (i == -1) return false; int
